price: Yã ku waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Kada ku gabãta (da kõme) gaba ga Allah da Manzon Sa.* Kuma ku yi ɗã'ã ga Allah da taƙawa. Lalle Allah Mai ji ne, Masani.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تُقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: * Wannan yã nũna mana cewa bã yã halatta ga Musulmi ya yi wani aiki ko ya faɗi wata magana sai yã san hukuncin Allah a cikinsu. Kuma kada ya ƙãra wãyõnsa a kan abinda Allah Yã ce, kuma kada ya rage idan yanã da ĩkon cikãwa. Dukan wannan yakan ja Musulmi ga ɓãcin ayyukansa, watau ya yi ridda daga Musulunci.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tuqaddimū bayna yadayi al-lahi warasūlihi wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
